TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DayRenderEventHandler(object sender, DayRenderEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DayRenderEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DayRenderEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DayRenderEventArgs)
public delegate void DayRenderEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DayRenderEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然不支援資料繫結控制項，就能修改內容的個別的日期資料格的格式。Although data binding is not supported for the control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 之前網頁上顯示控制項時，它會建立組合構成控制項的元件。Before the control is displayed on a Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 就會引發事件時每個日期儲存格建立控制項。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 您可以控制內容和格式的日期 儲存格時提供的事件處理常式的程式碼會建立事件。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 如需有關自訂的日期 儲存格內容的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see . 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，讓背景的黃色中顯示的月份日期。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month. 它也會示範如何加入自訂資料格內容控制項加入儲存格。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the cell. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Calendar.DayRender Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar.DayRender Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Calendar.DayRender Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar.DayRender Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarDayRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarDayRender/CS/calendardayrendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarDayRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarDayRender/VB/calendardayrendervb.aspx#1)]
